title: Episode 244: John Edward Robinson Part 3
description:
We’ve finally got to the third and final installment of Alaina’s deep dive into John Edward Robinson. Shit has gone down, the police have everything they need to close in on this monster and just wait until you hear about the mass of evidence found. This case will have your mind running in circles for the next 84 years.

CHECK OUT THIS BOOK!
Anyone You Want Me To Be by John Douglas and Stephen Singular

As always,thank you to our sponsors:
